title: Amir Khan Said Floyd Mayweather ‘Chickened Out’ Of Fighting Him
text:
Amir Khan Said Floyd Mayweather ‘Chickened Out’ Of Fighting Him 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
British boxer Amir Khan has made it known in the past that he wants to fight Floyd Mayweather, Jr. before Mayweather retires, and as it i...
